
``mean_giotto``
===================

mean_giotto

Description
-----------

mean function that works with multiple matrix representations

Usage
-----

.. code-block:: r

   mean_giotto(x, ...)

Arguments
---------

.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Argument
     - Description
   * - ``x``
     - vector
   * - ``list()``
     - additional parameters


Value
-----

numeric
